backup.description: Backup all entries in a dynamodb table to a file

source.name: source
source.description: Name of the DynamoDB to copy entries from

region.name: region
region.description: AWS region that the DynamoDB is hosted in

batchSize.name: batchSize
batchSize.description: The number of items to copy at a time

args.name: file
args.description: Path to write the backup to.

copy.description: Copy the contents of one dynamodb table to another

batchSize.name: batchSize
batchSize.description: The number of items to copy at a time

region.name: region
region.description: Region for both source and destination tables

sourceProfile.name: sourceProfile
sourceProfile.description: AWS Credentials profile to copy from

destinationProfile.name: destinationProfile
destinationProfile.description: AWS Credentials profile to copy to
